previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Portland Timbers | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 3, Portland Timbers 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Galaxy and Timbers are underway at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: LA Galaxy vs. Portland Timbers

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Erik Weber
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy vs #PortlandTimbers #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portland Timbers. Danny O'Rourke tries a through ball, but Maximiliano Urruti is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Robbie Keane with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Luïs Romero
timelineItems.text: From a golf course to a soccer stadium and all before noon. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Paul D.
timelineItems.text: Nine minutes in and Donovan is already shaking his head. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Harrington (Portland Timbers).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: LA is moving the ball much faster than usual. Quick passes; speed over precision. Lesson they learned from Man U? #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #lag getting the space and space on right sides of the box. Ridgwell and OR might have to shift over. Still nothing doing for LA #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 10' @LAGalaxy are very clearly trying to go to the flanks to exploit the compact Timbers. Creating space, but no great chances yet. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: jamie pham
timelineItems.text: Not so good passing in the final third from the @LAGalaxy. #LAvPOR #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Saul Antunez
timelineItems.text: First #lagalaxy game. #newfan #puroLA #gogalaxy!

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 0, Portland Timbers 1. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Diego Valeri wraps a free kick into the top shelf

timelineItems.comment: Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Donovan and Keane *almost* combine for something dangerous. Portland's back line missing some discipline. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: You'd think they were playing this game on a moon bounce the way the ball is rolling. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 14' TIMBERS GOAL! Diego Valeri with a fantastic finish off the free kick that freezes Penedo. Suspect foul on LD leads to POR goal. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Marcelo Sarvas swipes a shot wide

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Portland goal. Diego Valeri casually arcs the free kick into the right corner. LA's had the better of it so far. Can they recover? #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Oh you bad, Diego. #LAvPOR http://t.co/yUQQxGmDwt

timelineItems.name: Max
timelineItems.text: Landon has to wake up! Not blaming this on Landon but if he would have finished some of his touches we would have been ahead. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Perfectly placed free kick. And the Galaxy wall was a step in front of the foam spray line. Valeri is brilliant. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jack Jewsbury (Portland Timbers).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Delay in match Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: renzo83
timelineItems.text: #LAgalaxy

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: I could swear that Valeri free kick took a tiny deflection off Zardes' head. Judges? #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Caleb is talking to Jack on the sideline. Jewsbury is totally winded. With the lead maybe they'll be keeping him back #LAvPOR

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Juninho's crack from distance flounders wide

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: jgomez1028
timelineItems.text: At #StubHubCenter for the #LAGalaxy #Soccer #Game. Against #PortlandTimber #Futbol

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: That'll get the crowd going. #LAvPOR https://t.co/WRfrljMnHU

timelineItems.comment: Omar González (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Maximiliano Urruti (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Adrian Melville
timelineItems.text: Valeri ranks 4th in #MLS w 53 chances created, while Juninho leads #LAGalaxy in tackles, so should be interesting to watch both in midfield

timelineItems.name: JG Sports
timelineItems.text: Donovan has definitely shown up to give his best effort though! #LAvPOR #Donovan #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Give Donovan credit: his passes aren't connecting, but he's working harder than anybody else out there. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Sanjay Parekh
timelineItems.text: #LetsGoGalaxyLetsGo #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portland Timbers. Diego Valeri tries a through ball, but Maximiliano Urruti is caught offside.
Match ends, LA Galaxy 3, Portland Timbers 1.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: FT: The #LAGalaxy move into second place with a huge win over @TimbersFC: http://t.co/vJ3n85j6Ya #LAvPOR http://t.co/A31hWX71dV

timelineItems.name: Dan Itel
timelineItems.text: Have to think it's mostly the psychology of "we just can't get over the hump" that stings the most. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Kip Kesgard
timelineItems.text: To be fair, officiating isn't only reason for #Timbers woes. Never matched intensity & left defense to wilt. No offensive pressure at all.

timelineItems.name: Steve Davis
timelineItems.text: Ha! Think we just saw #LAGalaxy star man Robbie Keane say "no .... Not doing that" to NBC post-game request. Nice attitude

timelineItems.desc: Another marquee match between two Western Conference powers is ahead when the LA Galaxy play host to the Portland Timbers at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs. Portland Timbers | August 2, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane brace propels @LAGalaxy to 2nd in the West. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/RpQTKgjp0O #LAvPOR http://t.co/YZulSr1JuL

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We've got a packed house in Pioneer Square for this #LAvPOR tilt. http://t.co/K2B8K59IcS

timelineItems.name: Paul C.
timelineItems.text: @StrongMLS just pronounced it River Plate not in spanish, but like a dish. Seriously. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Valeri is finding so much space out to the right. Like iso play in hoops, #timbers players are clogging the left leaving Valeri free #rctid

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 21' Rogers with a tidy little cross down the flank but Ricketts comes out and scoops it up before Zardes can punch it in. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Lawrence Smalls
timelineItems.text: Never enough soccer. #lagalaxy #portlandtimbers #stubhubcenter #soccer #mls #culture

timelineItems.text: #LAvPOR #RCTID timing and tempo just off for Donovan so far this game... whew... dangerous moment there for @tiimbersfc supporters

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Alhassan has shifted Valeri to the middle. Team more of a 4-2-3-1 now with Urruti the single striker. #rctid #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: Donovan is best when running. Portland is not letting him. I expect Bruce to move him to Fwd next half if this keeps up. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.text: Valeri led the charge with only three allies as Johnson, Chara held back, kept their shape but clearly seeing opening on LA flank #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jack Jewsbury (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Stott allowing seemingly everything to go begging right now. Ridgewell pulls down Gonzalez in the box but no call. #LAvPOR.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Adi, Harrington, Valeri, and Fernandez have all gotten well acquainted with the rolled out grass carpets of StubHub Center today #LAvPOR
